main.name: Saif Alushi
main.bio: Hello my name is Saif Alushi! I am a junior Software Engineer who loves headaches... I mean problem sovling! My first introduction to programming was right before I started college and I asked my friend for an old textbook of his from any CS class and I taught my self C++. From there I went on to pursue my associates in computer science and work in sales. During my time at Uber I realized I looked forward to the end of the day so I could start coding. So I quit my job and attended General Assembly's software engineering bootcamp.

work.title: SMB Consultant
work.description: Negotiated sales deals between businesses and Uber, resulting in mutually beneficial agreements and cultivated relationships. Built and strengthened relationships with new and existing accounts to drive revenue growth. Identified client business needs by gaining understanding of goals, objectives and processes. Recorded and maintained sales prospect and sales data within salesforce. Stayed up-to-date on changing industry and product standards and trends relatedto accounts. Created solutions to problems through the U4B platform and allowed businesses to leverage Uber's core services.

work.title: Sr. Account Executive
work.description: Built and strengthened relationships with new and existing accounts to drive revenue growth. Helped implement go-to-market sales strategy using company data to accurately target our demographic. Created and managed digital marketing campaigns specifically to suit client needs. Created and assisted in content marketing strategies to help expand outreach. Client relationships that I have established but are not limited to: TVMG, Dress to Impress, Built by.AI, Sociafy, Financial Assest Protection, S2 CommerceView. Generated over $1M in revenue. Helped generate hundreds of inbound leads for our company through improved marketing campaigns and ads.

work.title: Lead Project Account Manager
work.description: Delivered engaging and polished presentations to highlight products and draw favorable competitor comparisons. Managed high-value accounts through consultative ad campaigns, effective customer solutions and promoting compelling business opportunities. Clients I have manged but not limited to: Xfinity, AT&T Oversaw business development and client analytics that lead to a 12% increase in revenue for the company during my first year. Improved account management by predicting potential competitive threats and outlining proactive solutions. Liaised communication between account holders and cross-functional departments. Assisted in total YoY growth through recommenced marketing Strategies and deep knowledge.
